title: 某些帖子图片挂掉
author: kjfg
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kjfg 于 2013-7-12 17:11 编辑 

鄙人很懒所以啊.....不是程序猿可能看不懂

上传的图都看不到 我用新标签页打开图片出现的错误：502 Bad Gateway  The proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server. Sorry for the inconvenience. Please report this message and include the following information to us. Thank you very much!  URL:  http://www.mcbbs.net/data/myattachment/forum/201307/12/105845iwa8a8sg64a88wiy.png Server:        lb-130304ay41d-3 Date:        2013/07/12 16:59:43 Powered by Tengine

replies.author: dcsuibian
replies.txt_content: 额，论坛好像已经发表申明说不建议使用图片上传，用图床试试

replies.txt_content: 论坛最近有问题，上传的图都看不到用图床吧
